Definition: Organisation of content and design of navigation systems

Organisation schemes.Exact: Everything fits exactly into its category (i.e. alphabetical)
Organisation schemes.Inexact: Not everything fits perfectly into its category (i.e. movie categories)

Card sorting.Description: Using cards with names of items on them and sorting them into piles of categories
Card sorting.Open card sorting procedure: User is given a stack of cards and is told to organise them into categories
Card sorting.Closed card sorting procedure: User is given a stack of cards and is told to organise them into specific categories
